trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around August 31st 2006
Summary: small orb or bottom of a disk
divs: sighting detailsi was mowing the lawn and shortly after finishing i looked up in the sky like i always do (seen them 5 x) and spotted a single silver orb that was moving slow to the south so i moved to the back yard to follow it and pulled my camera (canon powershot sd550) out of my pocket. i took a few shots using a tree for reference (these were emailed to(erich5@mindspring.com and wa3qlw@qwest.net) i then noticed that the solo one i spotted was moving toward a second so i took 3 movies, they are 16mb 19mb and 50mb and of the three one was uploaded here http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=gm-sycntpd8. i will be pulling this down after i here from you. i then took several more shots of the pair. like i said i have seen them befor and never have i seen them so close. i will also add that i do not feel that i slept well the night befor , i mean i went to bed and fell asleep but i dont belive i got any r.e.m sleep.
